title: Where can I learn the basics of songwriting? - Quora

response.answer_text: Well I can’t help but suggest the many great songwriting podcasts - one of them being Song Talk Radio - one of the host’s is genius! Song Talk Radio with Bruce, Neel & Phil Also try to find a songwriters meetup - there’s a ton of them around. A great place to meet others and learn. We’ve been running this monthly meetup since 2013 The Songwriters' Meetup (Toronto, ON) Lots of fun
